emptypage.noproject: In this section, the tasks that belong to you are listed. And you can create new tasks by pressing the '+' button on the right.

gorevscren.gorevadihata: Enter Task Name. Task Name Cannot Be Blank!
gorevscren.gorevaciklamahata: Enter Task Description. Task Description Cannot be left blank!
gorevscren.gorevtarihhata: Enter Mission Date. Task Date Cannot Be Blank!
gorevscren.gorevsaathata: Enter Task Time. Task Time Cannot Be Empty!
